title: Jhin is nuts.
body:
Get on that freelo, boys.

Build path:

{{item:3508}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3124}} 

Enjoy 100% crit with 1k AD.

https://i.gyazo.com/392db332acecfb491a74b35b65ee2bae.png

I was in a 1v2 lane, against a Morg and Trist, and I still carried. Look at that crit. Take 200 - 300 off because of minions. But I was hitting rapid 1.2k crits every auto.

replies.body:
Umm, doesn't crit% convert to AD, and you auto crit on 4th shot?

You can't crit every auto on Jhin... only every 4th (equivalent to 25% crit, but guaranteed on that 4th).

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ny49e3tY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-27T22:43:27.725+0000)
>
> Umm, doesn't crit% convert to AD, and you auto crit on 4th shot?
> 
> You can't crit every auto on Jhin... only every 4th (equivalent to 25% crit, but guaranteed on that 4th).

No, you can crit every auto. Try it.

Two things annoy me about Jhin

1. His reload time isn't enough downtime for someone who does that much damage and moves that fast.
2. WHY THE HELL DOES HE MOVE THAT FAST? He's a long range immobile damage dealer, he shouldn't be running at 500+ every time he hits an auto. Maybe on his 4th shot it's acceptable, but not on every crit...

**Dont get me wrong**, Jhin is not someone I have that many problems with, I think he's a great champ both thematically and ability wise. But the stone cold fact is that ADC's _(especially ones that can snipe you from the fog of war)_ shouldn't be hyper mobile _(I thought we learned that lesson with Vayne?)_, thats just common sense. And when you can slow someone, snare someone, and outrun the flash, you start to have a little too much utility for someone who doesn't even have to be near the fight to do his job.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ny49e3tY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-27T01:23:30.844+0000)

> 2. WHY THE HELL DOES HE MOVE THAT FAST? He's a long range immobile damage dealer, he shouldn't be running at 500+ every time he hits an auto. Maybe on his 4th shot it's acceptable, but not on every crit...
> 
> **Dont get me wrong**, Jhin is not someone I have that many problems with, I think he's a great champ both thematically and ability wise. But the stone cold fact is that ADC's _(especially ones that can snipe you from the fog of war)_ shouldn't be hyper mobile _(I thought we learned that lesson with Vayne?)_, thats just common sense. And when you can slow someone, snare someone, and outrun the flash, you start to have a little too much utility for someone who doesn't even have to be near the fight to do his job.

Jhin needs to do so much damage to balance out his reload, but Riot didn't really think that if he can just sit in the back, two shotting anyone that comes near him, that downtime is null and void. If a support peels for Jhin, have fun against him because he is one of the most frustrating ADC's to lane against, only just behind Ezreal. That's my opinion, though.

I agree with this. With 100% crit chance, his lack of mobility is gone because he gets a free ghost every auto. I could kite a Yi and he could not reach me. Let that sink in for a moment. His snare, which has a 4s CD at 18, also helps him immensely, either while reloading or just kiting. He is too hard to catch and pin down. Only his fourth shot should give MS, to aid with kiting while you have minimal damage.

The issue, at the moment, is that itemization is too good for ADCs. Jhin gets free stats from everything as AS gives him AD, each auto from Guinsoo's gives him, like, a free BF sword each auto. It's not just Jhin, either. Most ADC's haven't changed and they either become really good on item changes or really bad. However, Jhin is too similar to Vayne. He can be strong as hell one patch, then completely unviable the next.

At the current time, playing top, jungle, or mid is pointless. bot lane decides the game. I feel bad for top, because they're essentially meatshields for the ADCs and that role is absolute garbage and unfun to play. Riot needs to fix ADC before any other role can be tweaked. ADC should not be the carry role, they're marksmen, according to Riot, not carries.
